onboarding.title1: Stay safe while meeting new people
onboarding.body1: Avalo is for adults only. Never send money or share financial details outside the app.
onboarding.body2: Choose public places, tell a friend where you are going, and use in-app tools.
onboarding.body3: If someone makes you feel unsafe, block them, report their profile or contact support.

tip.title: Before you meet in person
tip.body: Meet in public first, share your plans with someone you trust, and keep communication inside Avalo when possible.

offPlatform.title: Be careful with your contact details
offPlatform.body: When you share your phone or social media, Avalo cannot protect you outside the app. Never send money or documents to strangers.

payment.title: Pay safely
payment.body: Only pay when you feel comfortable. Avalo does not guarantee what happens outside the app.

banner.low: Remember to protect your personal and financial information.
banner.medium: Be careful what you share. If something feels wrong, stop and report.
banner.high: Be extra careful with this conversation. Do not send money or personal documents. Block and report if you feel pressured.
